DataElement.preferredName: Patient To Treating Healthcare Facility Direct Distance Mile Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Value to represent the direct (shortest) geographic distance measured in number of miles from the residence of a person to the organization where treatment is/was provided.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient To Treating Healthcare Facility Direct Distance
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._Providing treatment for._An organization that devotes some or all of its resources (people, places, things) to the delivery of healthcare services (including the financial and administrative management of those resources). A healthcare facility may be manifest as a single physical location (e.g. building), or, alternatively, as a distributed collection of physical spaces. EXAMPLE(S): Northwestern Memorial Hospital_As an immediate result; having nothing intervening; without deviation or interruption._The space between two objects or points.
